[[1988â89 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1988â89]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) [[association football|football]] in 1987-88 season. Starting from this season three points for a win rule is adopted. ==1987â88 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group B in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1987â88 Turkish Second Football League|1987â88]] Season. Starting from this season three points for a win rule is adopted. League played in three groups two with 17 teams and one with 18. Bottom three teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]], whereas top teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] at the end of the season[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/8788/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 31 August 2009.. MÄ°Y finished 11th with 11 wins and 37 goals. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group B in [[1987â88 Turkish Second Football League|1987â88]] season is shown in the following tableStandings and results from [http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/8788/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
